The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 October is 540,396 (960.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 October, there were 86,652 new confirmed cases (153.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 October, there were 62,224 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 39% ( 24,428 extra cases).
